short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically loads all coupons from the Shoprite Digital Coupon Center to your account

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ShopRite Coupon Auto Loader automatically load coupons from the Digital Coupon Center directly to your ShopRite account card. This automates the coupon clipping process, saving you precious time and money when you shop.

Usage:
1) Make sure you're logged in to https://www.shoprite.com/
2) Visit the "Digital Coupons" page (refresh if you weren't logged in already) https://www.shoprite.com/sm/planning/rsid/999/digital-coupon/
3) All your coupons already loaded and you're done
